bibl.title: P. Berol. Inv. 5008, Didymus, and Harpocration Reconsidered.
bibl.note: The anonymous lexicon in P. Berol. Inv. 5008 (= Pack2 317) and Harpocration's lexicon are dependent on a common source, which in turn is dependent on Didymus and perhaps one other commentator.
bibl.seg: GIBSON Craig A., P. Berol. Inv. 5008, Didymus, and Harpocration Reconsidered.
The anonymous lexicon in P. Berol. Inv. 5008 (= Pack2 317) and Harpocration's lexicon are dependent on a common source, which in turn is dependent on Didymus and perhaps one other commentator.
